OOC: I want to tell you my char is suffering from extreme guily.  I'm 
not going to tell you everything but he doesn't have a really tight 
hold on sanity.

BIC:  He turns back around and points his gun at Panthos.

TT:  Listen I don't know who you are and I don't really give a rip.  I 
just want a way off this stupid planet so I can get back to work.  
Atonement must be made for my crimes.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Jonathan" <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> He shoots the fuel tank causing the shuttle to explode.  He sits 
down 
> on a rock in a rage.
> 
> 
> {Panthos - Africa}
> 
>     The panther stopped a moment listening to the explosion watching 
the plume of blackish smoke erupt from further on, his pace moderately 
slow as he approached the blast site and the ranting bot with weapon 
drawn, a feline chuckle escaping him as he plopped down in a sitting 
position watching the bot rant. "I concur, it is a piece of junk....at 
least now it is..."
